caption.p:
Fluctuation functions (solid) for CMIP5 AR5 models. The respective crossover time scales present are ( a) member 1: 32 days, 310 days, 861 days (stars); member 2: 12 days, 74 days (diamonds); ( b) 30 days, 127 days, 373 days, 6 years (stars); ( c) 32 days, 173 days, 3.3 years (stars). The dashed line (orange) denotes a slope of
. (Online version in colour.)
